definition: narrative history/comprehensive history/a history covering an extended period
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
surname Shi
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Shi Ji is a first general history of China by chronology.

sentences.english: The phased division of General History of Chinese History.
sentences.chinese: 对中国史学通史的阶段性划分。

sentences.english: ShiJi is the first book of The General History in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 《史记》是中国历史上第一部纪传体通史。
